fields.name: Bay Watch (Passive):
fields.value: Grant the lowest-scoring player of your same alignment a boost equal to two tenths of your score. This ability is astral.

fields.name: Ready to Rescue (Passive):
fields.value: You will submit a secondary response each evening. If a player of your alignment DNPs, they will receive half the score, and the same standard deviation, garnered by your secondary response. You must designate which response is your secondary response. This ability is astral.

fields.name: Swim Lesson (Charge 110%):
fields.value: Use during the day. Grant your target an additional response. You will gain an additional Hello Neighbor with your target.

fields.name: Blow Whistle (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Use during the day. That evening, your target must respond in exactly 5 words. If they violate this restriction it will be considered a DNP.
